Uses of Class
com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations.PairedReadManager

  • Packages that use PairedReadManager 
    Package Description
    com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.sequence
    Provides interfaces specifying the types of sequence and alignment documents in Geneious, together with concrete classes used by sequence documents such as SequenceAnnotation and SequenceCharSequence.
    com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations
    Provides implementations for many of the document interfaces defined in the package com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.types together with some utility classes for dealing with some of these document types.
    com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin
    Provides the GeneiousPlugin interface and plugin related interfaces.

    • Uses of PairedReadManager in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.sequence

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PairedReadManager DefaultSequenceListDocument.getImmutablePairedReadManager() 
      PairedReadManager PairedReads.getImmutablePairedReadManager()
      An immutable view of the paired reads managed by this list or alignment.
      PairedReadManager SequenceAlignmentDocument.getImmutablePairedReadManager() 
      PairedReadManager SequenceListOnDisk.AlignmentData.getPairedReadManager()
      Returns a PairedReadManager for these sequences.
      Methods in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.sequence with parameters of type PairedReadManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DefaultSequenceListDocument.setPairedReadsManager(PairedReadManager pairedReadsManager)
      Sets a paired read manager to correspond with the nucleotide sequences for this document.

    • Uses of PairedReadManager in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations

      Methods in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations that return PairedReadManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.addSequence()
      Adds a sequence to be managed by this paired read manager.
      PairedReadManager DefaultAlignmentDocument.getImmutablePairedReadManager() 
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.getImmutablePairedReadManager()
      Marks this instance as setCopyOnWrite() and returns this.
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.removeSequence(int indexToRemove)
      Removes a sequence from this PairedReadManager, unpairing it with its mate if necessary.
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.reorderSequences(int[] ordering)
      Reorders the sequences in this paired read manager, as defined by GeneralUtilities.reorder(int[], int[]).
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.setInterlaced(int expectedDistance, PairedReadManager.Orientation orientation)
      Marks all the reads in the data set as being interlaced with the given orientation.
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.setMates(int sequenceIndex, int mateIndex, int expectedMateDistance)
      Records the 2nd sequence as being paired with the first sequence with the given distance.
      PairedReadManager PairedReadManager.Builder.toPairedReadManager()
      Creates a new PairedReadManager from this builder.
